title: Natural and Healthy Food Products at affordable prices
description: NatureMills Natural Food Products. Natural Sesame Oil, Peanut Oil, Palmyra Palm Jaggery, Raw cane jaggery, Moringa leaf powder, Seeraga Samba Rice, Cashews, Turmeric, Millets, soups, health mixes. Natural and Healthy Food products at affordable prices. Nature Mills offers Free shipping for orders above $75. Healthy.
cleaned_text: Rice MIXES Variety of mixes to make your rice taste better. Just mix with cooked rice. Add ghee or sesame oil for better taste. [Shop Now](/collections/rice-mix) Spice Mixes Spice up your meals with our traditional spice mixes. Prepared using an authentic home style recipe. [Shop Now](/collections/spices) ABOUT NATUREMILLS NatureMills is founded with a mission to inspire healthy life by providing healthy, authentic and natural food products. We believe the food products we choose have greater impact on our health, community and the environment. That's why all our products are processed with traditional methods and packed with no refining or adulteration to retain natures nutrition for a safe and healthy living.
